tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I believe me and my wife are very lucky to come across Dr Swetha. I have never seen such a genuine and kind doctor with so much patience who explains in detail and answers all your questions, responds back in case of emergencies and provides such a good treatment. We consulted Dr. Swetha when my wife had to undergo D&C. she did the D&C and then we continued consulting her for treatment for next pregnancy. My wife conceived again and Dr Swetha performed regular scans and provided necessary treatment for the baby growth and ensured the baby is delivered. Post delivery my wife had some other general complications but she stood by us patiently and provided us lot of morale support. I am very thankful to Dr. Swetha for giving such wonderful care and treatment to my wife and help us get a miracle baby boy. ** ***** **** **** *** ********** *********** *************** I definitely & strongly recommend Dr Swetha.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited Dr.Swetha for my wife.Actually my wife had PCOD issues, still she gave her a treatment in such a way to conceive naturally that was one of the impressive thing.After pregnancy she did'nt  give any unwanted test and medicines.she is such a polite and friendly doctor.you can ask for details and she will respond with patience.She responds for emergencies quickly without any hesitation, and can reach her over a call and message. During this pregnancy my wife got covid, the way she gave treatment was very good, and she even tracked the progress till my wife gets negative.She is such a dedicated and a sincere doctor , treated like a family.I strongly recommend Dr.Swetha.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have been consulting Doctors since 1 and half year and we were not being treated by any Gynec in a professional way rather personal treatment.  We sensed a very polite and humble way of treating and addressing our concerns with respect to my Wife's pre-maternal issues and post-delivery counselling and care by Mrs. Dr. Vanamala Swetha garu ( Madhu's Mother Clinic, Nizampet, Hyderabad) . It is an honor to portrait our happiness and over all experience with the journey of my Child from the day of my wife's pregnancy. My wife is strongly recommending this doctor to our friends who has been suffering from different Gynec issues. Before we end this up, out of our experience we assure you will sense our Mother care and safe hands while she treats us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I first visited Dr.Swetha one and a half year ago for PCOD treatment and was extremely satisfied with how she has explained the problem and made me comfortable with the medical treatment I was given. Since then, from the fertilization treatment to the birth of my child, she has paid utmost care personally to the treatment throughout and I never had to second guess my choice of doctor. She has never rushed a consultation session and would only let me leave until all my questions are answered and I'm comfortable. Overall it was a great experience visiting her and would highly recommend her for anyone looking for a reliable gynecologist/obstetrician.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We went to shweta madam for my wife's pregnancy and we would strongly recommend her because of her friendly nature with patients and her patience in explaining each and every thing clearly. She will be so connected with her patients so well.We are thankful that we are under her guidance throughout the pregnancy. She gave us lot of confidence and support throughout the 9 months . We would never forget the mental support and care she gave us. We are very fortunate to be under her guidance and medical supervision till date.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I'm sai spandana, I took treatment for pregnancy. since I was at 3rd month pregnancy that time we were new to Nizampet, we had visited multiple hospitals but finally we met Sweth Doctor. she has friendly in nature and explains problem in detail. we are very thankful to doctor for her kindness,response and availability in urgent situations. Now I'm blessed with baby boy with healthy condition. I strongly recommend Swetha doctor for Gyenacology problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Swetha Vanamala has nice way of approach, kind and polite. She explained my problem thoroughly and  suggested minimal tests and  medicines. When in doubt , she is approachable and puts your fears and doubts to rest. I would highly recommend Dr. Swetha for any kind of gynae problems.

Doctor explains will during the consultation but it‚Äôs difficult to catch her for any clarification outside the consultation. Tendency to pitch internal pharmacy and preferred diagnostic centres which are quite expensive vs ordering online. Staff is quite unprofessional in terms of sticking to appointment time. Operates first come first serve basis.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Swetha is my gynaecologist. She heard my problems and suggested few medicines. There was a great change in my health once I started those medicines. Even during my follow up video consultation appointment she made sure I don‚Äôt have any issues and suggested few things which need to be taken care of. I would definitely recommend her to my family and friends. Thanks you for your Support Shwetha during this tough times..üôè

review: I got a recommendation about Dr. Swetha from my family members and at that time I was little uncomfortable with other doctor visited for pregnancy health check. First impression on Dr. Swetha was very good, she is understandable and has so much patience to deal with a to-be Mom and she is always soft spoken. I had 5 visits with her so far and she was always helpful to understand my concerns and lead me into right direction. I had to move to my home town due to COVID outbreak in Hyderabad, otherwise I'd have loved to have Dr. Swetha deliver my baby. Thank you Dr. Swetha for all the care and we wish to meet you soon.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: we visited Doctor once got the pregnancy in first month and she explained well interms of precautions and guidance to be followed during pregnancy period.*** ***** ** ** **** ** ** *************** * ** *** **** ****** ** ** ****** *** ** ****** ** ***** ***** ** *****after seeing the report and she saying same and will have to do it again after 10days.so I felt unhappy **** ***** ** ** **** *** *********** **** *** ******
reply_text: Now era is Early diagnosis ... Early scan is done to Rule out ectopic pregnancy (pregnancy not in uterus ) even though rare it is significant dangerous to mother .I ask for scan at 5weeks ..Gestation sac is seen at 4weeks from which we can confirm pregnancy is in uterus . and even if sac not seen 10days after first scan ,I start investigating for ectopic pregnancy .And I assess need for hormonal support too ...And I do only after your consent ..and in my practice I never charged for repeat scan ...I would have been happy if you asked same query during consultation instead of giving wrong statements in online platform...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
